https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anatomi._instruction: Add the anatomical entity that semantically best describes the anatomical location of the electrode contact.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/contact.name: contactResistance

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.description: Piece of equipment or mechanism (hardware) designed to serve a special purpose or perform a special function.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.label: Device
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.name: device

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this device usage that may help you to find this instance more easily.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/metadat._instruction: Add all files or file bundles containing additional information about the usage of this device.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/metadat.name: metadataLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/spatial._instruction: Add the coordinate point that best describes the spatial location of the electrode contact during its use.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/spatial.name: spatialLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/usedSpe._instruction: Add the state of the tissue sample or subject that this device was used on.
